## GAD-7 vs BAPQ

When comparing and harmonising different psychological questionnaires such as GAD-7 (Generalised Anxiety Disorder Assessment) and BAPQ (Broad Autism Phenotype Questionnaire), the process can often prove to be time-consuming and intricate. This is where Harmony comes into play. Harmony is a software for psychologists that streamlines the harmonisation of such questionnaire items through its advanced use of natural language processing and generative AI models. By using Harmony, psychologists can conduct a comparative analysis of GAD-7 vs BAPQ with ease and efficiency. With the GAD-7 instrument focused on nervosity and anxiety, and the BAPQ tool exploring aspects of social behaviour, comparing these can offer comprehensive insights into an individual's emotional and social landscape. Harmony's large language models compare the different items featured in both these instruments, indicating a percentage match between each item in the GAD-7 vs BAPQ. These shared correlations can offer valuable data for psychologists, enabling more nuanced and multidimensional analyses of an individual's psychological state. The process of using Harmony for a GAD-7 vs BAPQ comparison is straightforward and user-friendly. Psychologists can choose to either select instruments from Harmony’s extensive database or directly upload questionnaires as PDFs via Harmony’s web interface. The results of the analysis offer significant potential for psychologists to enhance their understanding of generalised anxiety in relation to broader social behaviours and preferences. So, when considering a comprehensive comparison between GAD-7 vs BAPQ, Harmony emerges as a valuable tool for any psychologist's arsenal.

## Compare the items in GAD-7 English and BAPQ

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import GAD-7 and BAPQ into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GAD-7 into Harmony</a> - compare GAD-7 English with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just BAPQ into Harmony</a> - compare BAPQ with other instruments


## Questions in GAD-7

|   No. | GAD-7 English                                                                                                                                      |
|------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge                                                                                                               |
|     2 | Not being able to stop or control worrying                                                                                                         |
|     3 | Worrying too much about different things                                                                                                           |
|     4 | Trouble relaxing                                                                                                                                   |
|     5 | Being so restless that it is hard to sit still                                                                                                     |
|     6 | Becoming easily annoyed or irritable                                                                                                               |
|     7 | Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen                                                                                                 |
|     8 | If you checked any problems, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people? |
